nodes._comment: Block dangerous system-level commands. Calendar, browser, contacts, reminders, SMS, and screen capture are allowed (Mac is dedicated to the bot).

commands._comment: Disable commands that allow the bot to modify its own runtime from chat.

elevated._comment: Elevated mode allows bypassing tool restrictions. Keep disabled.

exec._comment: All exec runs in sandbox, never on the host. Allowlist mode = only pre-approved commands.

soul-evil._comment: CRITICAL: This hook replaces SOUL.md with SOUL_EVIL.md. Must stay disabled.

plugins._comment: Empty allowlist = no plugins load. Add trusted plugin IDs explicitly.

telegram._comment: Prevent the bot from rewriting its own config via Telegram commands.

openrouter-cloud._comment: Fallback for complex tasks that exceed local model capabilities

memory._comment: Native embedding-based memory. Cognee Graph RAG is a future enhancement.
